verses.verse: Paul <S%G3972><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Timothy, <S%G5095><s%> Bondmen <S%G1401><s%> Of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> To All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Saints <S%G40><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Are <S%G5607><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Philippi, <S%G5375><s%> With The <S%G4862><s%> Overseers <S%G1985><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Those Who Serve. <S%G1249><s%>

Grace <S%G5485><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Peace <S%G1515><s%> From <S%G575><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3962><s%> Our Father <S%G2257><s%> And The <S%G2532><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>
I Thank <S%G2168><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2316><s%> My God <S%G3450><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The Whole <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Remembrance <S%G3417><s%> Of You, <S%G5216><s%>

Always <S%G3842><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Supplication <S%G1162><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> For <S%G5228><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> You <S%G5216><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Joy <S%G5479><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Supplication <S%G1162><s%> Making, <S%G4160><s%>

For <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2842><s%> Your Fellowship <S%G5216><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Glad Tidings, <S%G2098><s%> From The <S%G575><s%> First <S%G4413><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> Until <S%G891><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Now; <S%G3568><s%>

Being Persuaded Of <S%G3982><s%> <S%G846><s%> This Very Thing, <S%G5124><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> He Who <S%G3588><s%> Began <S%G1728><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> A Work <S%G2041><s%> Good <S%G18><s%> Will Complete It <S%G2005><s%> Until The <S%G891><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> Of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ; <S%G5547><s%>

As <S%G2531><s%> It Is <S%G2076><s%> Righteous <S%G1342><s%> For Me <S%G1698><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> To Think <S%G5426><s%> As To <S%G5228><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> You, <S%G5216><s%> Because <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Have <S%G2192><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heart <S%G2588><s%> Ye, <S%G5209><s%> <S%G1722><s%> Both In <S%G5037><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1199><s%> My Bonds <S%G3450><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In The <S%G3588><s%> Defence <S%G627><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Confirmation <S%G951><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Glad Tidings, <S%G2098><s%> Fellow Partakers <S%G4791><s%> <S%G3450><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of My Grace <S%G5485><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Ye <S%G5209><s%> Are. <S%G5607><s%>

<S%G3144><s%> For Witness <S%G1063><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> How <S%G5613><s%> I Long After <S%G1971><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Bowels <S%G4698><s%> Of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> I Pray, <S%G4336><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> Yet <S%G2089><s%> More <S%G3123><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> More <S%G3123><s%> May Abound <S%G4052><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Knowledge <S%G1922><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Intelligence, <S%G144><s%>

For <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Approve <S%G1381><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> The Things That <S%G3588><s%> Are Excellent, <S%G1308><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Ye May Be <S%G5600><s%> Pure <S%G1506><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Without Offence <S%G677><s%> For The <S%G1519><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> Of Christ, <S%G5547><s%>

Being Filled <S%G4137><s%> With Fruits <S%G2590><s%> Of Righteousness <S%G1343><s%> Which Are <S%G3588><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Praise <S%G1868><s%> God's. <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G1097><s%> But To Know <S%G1161><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> I Wish, <S%G1014><s%> Brethren, <S%G80><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> ' Concerning <S%G2596><s%> Me <S%G1691><s%> Rather <S%G3123><s%> To The <S%G1519><s%> Advancement <S%G4297><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Glad Tidings <S%G2098><s%> Have Turned Out, <S%G2064><s%>

So As <S%G5620><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1199><s%> My Bonds <S%G3450><s%> Manifest <S%G5318><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> To Have Become <S%G1096><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Whole <S%G3650><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Praetorium <S%G4232><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Rest <S%G3062><s%> All; <S%G3956><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Most <S%G4119><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Brethren <S%G80><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Trusting <S%G3982><s%> <S%G3588><s%> My Bonds <S%G1199><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> More Abundantly <S%G4056><s%> Dare <S%G5111><s%> Fearlessly <S%G870><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> To Speak. <S%G2980><s%>

Some <S%G5100><s%> Indeed <S%G3303><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> From <S%G1223><s%> Envy <S%G5355><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Strife, <S%G2054><s%> <S%G5100><s%> But Some <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> ' From <S%G1223><s%> Good Will <S%G2107><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Are Proclaiming. <S%G2784><s%>

Those <S%G3588><s%> Indeed <S%G3303><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> Contention <S%G2052><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> , Are Announcing, <S%G2605><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> , Purely, <S%G55><s%> Supposing <S%G3633><s%> Tribulation <S%G2347><s%> To Add <S%G2018><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1199><s%> To My Bonds, <S%G3450><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But These <S%G1161><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> , Love, <S%G26><s%> Knowing <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> Defence <S%G627><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Glad Tidings <S%G2098><s%> I Am Set. <S%G2749><s%>

<S%G5101><s%> What Then? <S%G1063><s%> Nevertheless <S%G4133><s%> In Every <S%G3956><s%> Way, <S%G5158><s%> Whether <S%G1535><s%> In Pretext <S%G4392><s%> Or <S%G1535><s%> In Truth, <S%G225><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Is Announced; <S%G2605><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> This <S%G5129><s%> I Rejoice, <S%G5463><s%> Yea, <S%G235><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> I Will Rejoice : <S%G5463><s%>

<S%G1492><s%> For I Know <S%G1063><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> For Me <S%G3427><s%> Shall Turn Out <S%G576><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Salvation <S%G4991><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5216><s%> Your Supplication, <S%G1162><s%> And The <S%G2532><s%> Supply <S%G2024><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ : <S%G5547><s%>

According To <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Earnest Expectation <S%G603><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Hope <S%G1680><s%> My, <S%G3450><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Nothing <S%G3762><s%> I Shall Be Ashamed, <S%G153><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Boldness, <S%G3954><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Always, <S%G3842><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> Shall Be Magnified <S%G3170><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4983><s%> My Body <S%G3450><s%> Whether <S%G1535><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> Life <S%G2222><s%> Or <S%G1535><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> Death. <S%G2288><s%>

<S%G1487><s%> But If <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Live <S%G2198><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Flesh, <S%G4561><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> For Me Is <S%G3427><s%> Fruit <S%G2590><s%> Of Labour : <S%G2041><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> I Shall Choose <S%G138><s%> <S%G3756><s%> I Know Not. <S%G1107><s%>

I Am Pressed <S%G4912><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> By <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Two, <S%G1417><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Desire <S%G1939><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Depart, <S%G360><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> To Be For It Is <S%G1511><s%> <S%G4183><s%> Very Much <S%G3123><s%> Better; <S%G2908><s%>
<S%G3588><s%> <S%G1161><s%> But To Remain <S%G1961><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Flesh Is <S%G4561><s%> More Necessary <S%G316><s%> ' For The Sake Of <S%G1223><s%> You; <S%G5209><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> Being Persuaded Of, <S%G3982><s%> I Know <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> I Shall Abide <S%G3306><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Continue With <S%G4839><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> You; <S%G5213><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5216><s%> Your Advancement <S%G4297><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Joy <S%G5479><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Faith; <S%G4102><s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2745><s%> Your Boasting <S%G5216><s%> May Abound <S%G4052><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Me <S%G1698><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1699><s%> My Presence <S%G3952><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> With <S%G4314><s%> You. <S%G5209><s%>

Only <S%G3440><s%> Worthily <S%G516><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Glad Tidings <S%G2098><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Conduct Yourselves, <S%G4176><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Whether <S%G1535><s%> Having Come <S%G2064><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Seen <S%G1492><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> Or <S%G1535><s%> Being Absent <S%G548><s%> I Might Hear <S%G191><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> You, <S%G5216><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Ye Stand Fast <S%G4739><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> <S%G1520><s%> Soul <S%G5590><s%> Striving Together <S%G4866><s%> With The <S%G3588><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Glad Tidings; <S%G2098><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> And <S%G3361><s%> Being Frightened <S%G4426><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Nothing <S%G3367><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Oppose; <S%G480><s%> Which <S%G3748><s%> <S%G846><s%> To Them <S%G3303><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> A Demonstration <S%G1732><s%> Of Destruction, <S%G684><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Of Salvation, <S%G4991><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> From <S%G575><s%> God; <S%G2316><s%>

Because <S%G3754><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> It Was Granted <S%G5483><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Concerning <S%G5228><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Only <S%G3440><s%> <S%G3588><s%> On <S%G1519><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To Believe, <S%G4100><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Concerning <S%G5228><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To Suffer, <S%G3958><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> Same <S%G846><s%> Conflict <S%G73><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> Such As <S%G3634><s%> Ye Saw <S%G1492><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Me, <S%G1698><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> Hear Of <S%G191><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Me. <S%G1698><s%>
